system.availability: A Massive, heavily armed servitor mounted on tracks or other highly augmented chassis. An almost perfect body guard or instrument of war. Can be equipped with any two of: Breacher, Chain Axe, Electro-Flail, Flamer, Heavy Bolter, Heavy Stubber, Melta Gun, Missile Launcher (Krak/Frag), Plasma Gun, or Webber. (Cost not included, but acquisition is).
system.cost:
Does not include costs of weapons it uses. Only Acquirable by Tech Priests
See Bestiary/InqHandbook Pg 141.
